name: Unleashed (itch) (mandysbo)
description:
Doggos are waiting around the neighbourhood for you to come and find them. Explore town, meet the variety of good pups, and take them along for your journey!

  • Created for SheHacksGames, an all-women weekend game jam hosted by Girl Geek Academy
  • Falling off the edge of the map is entirely possible and entirely not recommended
